section.title: Exporting Data
section.para: Eclipse NeoSCADA internally provides process data by the Hive interface. It is the internal, programming language specific, interface of accessing data. However in many cases it is necessary to access this data again over some sort of remote interface.

Data which is provided by Hive instance can be exported using exporters. The most common exporter in Eclipse NeoSCADA is the DA NGP exporter. It allows access to the Hive instance (DA interface) over the NGP protocol. The Java class implementing this functionality is org.eclipse.scada.da.server.ngp.Exporter.Exporter.
However there are a few other exporters which allow access to data from Eclipse NeoSCADA via some other protocols.
